pickipediaverification-desc: Enforces verification workflow for bot/AI edits on PickiPedia
pickipediaverification-bot-needs-propose: Bot edits must include verification markers. For template-based pages (Show, Venue, etc.), add |status=proposed. For other pages, wrap content with {{Bot_proposes}}.
verifybotedits-summary: Review and verify edits made by bots
